createRequest.title: Pair with another device
createRequest.description: The devices will be combined with a single profile and all your data will be synchronized

dialog.title: Linking this browser to another browser
dialog.description: Enter this code to accept the join request in another browser

warn.title: Be Careful!
warn.description: This action cannot be undone, after entering this code in another browser, your profiles will be merged into one profile. All your browsers will be synced together

applyRequest.description: Enter code to accept merge request

dialog.title: Associating another browser with this browser
dialog.description: Enter the code to accept a pairing request with another browser

warn.title: Be Careful!
warn.description: This action cannot be undone, after entering this code, your profiles will be merged into one profile. All your browsers will be synced together

error.NOT_VALID_CODE: Invalid code. It may be outdated or entered incorrectly
error.NOT_EXIST_MERGED_USER: No second user found, may have canceled the request
error.SAME_USER: You can't bind yourself. It's difficult and inconvenient

create.title: Create a backup
create.description: Save extension settings and bookmarks to your computer

error.wrongVersion: Error. Saving this version is not supported
